TopicTitle: Right click menus on screen please

Articles.Content:
Could you make the right click menus stay on screen?

Quite often the right click menus appear off screen and some times (like when you are about to crash) can't save the kerbal o ship because of that.

I think many people wil be thankful to have this feature in the game.

Yes, I'd like that too, I also would like a context sensitive right click menu which appears when I'm selecting one of two ships in close proximity to each other on the map. Currently I'm sometimes even having to quite to the space centre to try and change vessel
Same. I`ve been requesting a menu/popup list for selecting close craft from the map screen for a few updates now but it seems very low priority.
